personalData.about: Hello, My name is Lin LI. I came from Beijing, China. I just moved here several months ago. I am major in computer science and technology. I like web developing very much. Now I am looking for a job of web development.  I hope I can see you soon!

experienceData.content: Managed several Case Management Systems and Office Systems. Supported new System getting online.

Used HTML/CSS and JS/Jquery/AJAX to implement system’s static display and dynamic interactions. Processed data visualization using d3.js and drew a weibo propagation chart in circle-packing’s way by SVG. Developed a blog website based on Wordpress.

projectData.name: blog
projectData.title: Blog powered by Wordpress
projectData.description: Developed a blog website based on Wordpress, mainly changed the CSS style of the website according to the UI requirements and dealt with a little PHP code.

projectData.name: weiboManage
projectData.title: Weibo Management System
projectData.description: Used HTML/CSS and JS/Jquery/AJAX to implement system’s static display and dynamic interactions.

projectData.name: d3
projectData.title: Propagation Chart
projectData.description: Processed data visualization using d3.js and drew a weibo propagation chart in circle-packing’s way by SVG.
